data.message: Why is it that there is no customer service with Facebook?  I would love some one to answer my question for me!!!  I have an account in English and I want to set up a Page in Spanish...how do I do it?  Does Facebook have people that actually help or do they just have standard questions that don't apply to other people needing help?

replies.message: Yeah they only answered back to several people on the top comments. I want my question answered too. (if people get notified that they've been unblocked). I know it sounds like a stupid question but I just want clarification on it.
